snippet.title: Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer | TGS 2021
snippet.description:
Watch the exciting new Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin trailer, revealed that TGS 2021. Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin will release on March 18, 2022 on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC (via Epic Games Store).

"When darkness veils the world, four warriors of light shall come." Jack and his comrades must brave several challenges to bring the light of the crystals back to Cornelia, a kingdom conquered by darkness. Will restoring the crystals' light usher in peace or a new form of darkness? ... Or perhaps something else entirely?

Thanks for tuning into IGN's coverage of Tokyo Game Show 2021. TGS 2021 is 4 days full of new game reveals, new game trailers, and news for upcoming video games in 2021 and beyond.

#IGN #Gaming #FinalFantasyOrigin
